language.description: The language to use, either 'js' or 'ts'.

style.description: The style format to use. Choose from predefined options.

componentFileFormat.description: Defines the format of component files.

componentFileName.description: Optional custom name for the component file, if null the file name will be component name

styleFileName.description: Optional custom name for the style file, if null the file name will be component name

testLibrary.description: Optional test library to add test file for the component, if null no test file will be created .

useSuffix.description: Whether to use a model suffix.
